pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Nonparametric Trend Test for Independent and Dependent Samples // Implements the nonparametric trend test for one or several samples as proposed by Bathke (2009) doi:10.1007/s00184-008-0171-x. The method provides a unified framework for analyzing trends in both independent and dependent data samples, making it a versatile tool for various study designs. The package allows for the evaluation of different trend alternatives, including two-sided (general trend), monotonic increasing, and monotonic decreasing trends. As a nonparametric procedure, it does not require the assumption of data normality, offering a robust alternative to parametric tests.
